May 9, 2021 D European Championships (online voting)
European Championships 10 Set Test and Own Choice European Championships european-championships
(online) > special EBBA-Weekend to present a kind of 'Best of' Performances from the past almost 20 Years (highlights from 2003-2019) >Audience voted online for their TOP6 'all time' favourite Set Works and TOP6 Own Choices > Organised by EBBA and World of Brass, hosted by Frank Renton and Helen Varley and broadcast from Friday 7th - 9th
Again cancelled due to the COVID-19 Pandemic. Was planned to happen in Malmö, Sweden.
Oct. 14, 2019, 1:58 p.m. May 10, 2021, 12:31 p.m.
